item.title: Class, Case Class, and their secrets!
item.author: rodobarcaaa@gmail.com (Rodolfo Echemend√≠a Quintana)
item.description: As we already know from the previous article Why Scala, what is it and what is interesting about it?, Scala is a programming language that combines object-oriented and functional programming, then today we will see the class and case class, how to use them, some secrets of the case class and why they are the favorites for everyday use. What are Classes? Like other programming languages, a class is a template that defines an object; can contain values, variables, types, and methods that mostly operate on them.
